message.entry: Check for machine-parented data
Upgrade model
Upgrade the model by converting machine-parented data to data store memory chart data with values in the model workspace.
Check the model for instances of machine-parented data.
Check for machine-parented data
Check the model for instances of machine-parented data.
Checking for machine-parented data.
Model does not contain machine-parented data.
Passed
Failed
Model contains these machine-parented data objects:
Machine-parented data will no longer be supported in a future release. Upgrade the model by converting machine-parented data to data store memory.
Conversion was successful.
Successfully converted all machine-parented data to data store memory.
Conversion failed.
Unable to convert these machine-parented data objects:
Chart-parented data with the same name already exists.
Simulink.Signal or Simulink.Parameter object with the same name already exists in the model workspace.
''First Index'' property of machine-parented data has nonzero value.
Check for recursive event broadcasts in Stateflow
Check the model for recursive event broadcasts.
Checking the model for recursive event broadcasts.
Locations
Events
Model does not contain recursive event broadcasts.
The following were involved in recursive event broadcasts:
Recursive event broadcasts will no longer be supported in a future release. Upgrade the model by broadcasting events using guidelines mentioned in Avoid Unwanted Recursion in a Chart.
Check for import custom code
Check if the model imports custom code.
Upgrade model
Upgrade the model by selecting the import custom code checkbox.
Import custom code is selected for this model.
Import custom code is not selected for this model.
Import custom code will be selected by default in a future release. Upgrade the model by selecting the import custom code checkbox in the Configuration Parameters.
Import custom code checkbox was selected successfully.
